### Analysis of Marine Debris: A Tender Announcement

**Tender Title**
* English: Analysis of the Effects of Plastic Fishing Gear and Aquaculture in the Marine Environment
* French: Analyse des effets des engins de pêche et d’aquaculture en plastique dans le milieu marin

**Reference Number**
* cb-602-38078495

**Tender Status**
* English: Expired
* French: Expiré

**Notice Type**
* Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a socioeconomic report to analyze the impacts of abandoned, lost, or discarded fishing gear (ALDGF) and aquaculture in the marine environment. This report will require a Canadian perspective, exploring effects from local to national scales. Key topics include:

• Impacts on tourism and coastal communities
• Economic costs of clean-up efforts and gear retrieval
• Environmental damage to ecosystem services
• Potential revenue impacts due to existing linear economic models
• Recommendations for fisheries management measures and economic incentives

**Proposal Requirements**

Proposals must include a team of four experts:

• Principal researcher
• Co-researcher
• Research specialist
• Junior researcher

**Contract Details**

* Contract duration: from contract award to April 10, 2025, with an irrevocable option to extend the term by four additional six-month periods
* Regions of delivery: Canada
